sentences.cn: 一个忙忙碌碌、育有四个孩子的妈妈

sentences.en: A busy night in the restaurant can be frantic in the kitchen.
sentences.cn: 餐馆晚上生意好，厨房里可能会忙成一片。

sentences.en: Across the busy plaza, vendors sell hot dogs and croissant sandwiches.
sentences.cn: 在热闹广场的另一边，摊贩叫卖着热狗和羊角三明治。

sentences.en: By the look of things, Mr Stone and company will stay busy.
sentences.cn: 照目前的情况看，斯通先生他们还有的忙。

sentences.en: December is the busiest time of year for shops.
sentences.cn: 十二月份是一年中商店最繁忙的时期。

sentences.en: Football clubs have been busy in the close season transfer market.
sentences.cn: 足球俱乐部在休赛季节的转会市场上一直忙个不停。

sentences.en: I had a busy day and was rather tired.
I tried to reach him, but the line was busy.
sentences.cn: 我试图和他联系，但他的电话占线。

sentences.en: If you're in a job that keeps you busy, stick with it.
sentences.cn: 如果你所做的工作能让你很忙，那要坚持下去。

sentences.en: In the basement fifteen employees are busy making bespoke coats.
sentences.cn: 在地下室里，15名员工正在忙着缝制定做的外套。

sentences.en: It helps them to unwind after a busy day at work.
sentences.cn: 这有助于他们忙碌一天后放松自己。

sentences.en: It is the mother who is expected to reorganize her busy schedule.
sentences.cn: 应该让母亲来重新安排自己紧张的日程。

sentences.en: People who lead busy lives have no time to stop and reflect.
sentences.cn: 忙忙碌碌的人们无暇停下来反思。

sentences.en: Rachel said she would be too busy to come.
sentences.cn: 雷切尔说她太忙，不会来了。

sentences.en: She’s busy now – can you phone later?
sentences.cn: 她现在正忙，你稍后打来好吗？

sentences.en: Simon Lane quickly found his niche as a busy freelance model maker.
sentences.cn: 西蒙·莱恩很快找到了适合自己的位置，成了一名忙碌的模型制作的自由职业者。

sentences.en: There has been a busy start to polling in today's local elections.
sentences.cn: 今天地方选举的投票一开始就人头攒动。

sentences.en: There were lots of activities to keep the kids busy .
sentences.cn: 有很多活动可以让孩子们不闲着。

sentences.en: We have a very busy day ahead of us today.
sentences.cn: 今天迎接我们的将是非常忙碌的一天。

words.tran_cn: 喧闹；活跃；裙撑；热闹的活动

phrases.tran_cn: 像蜜蜂一样忙碌，忙得不可开交

trans.tran_cn: 忙碌的，熙来攘往的，占线的，全神贯注的，杂乱的
trans.tran_en: if you are busy, you are working hard and have a lot of things to do
if you are busy, you are working hard and have a lot of things to do
to use your time dealing with something
